channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report I-2023120066
item.description:
Report I-2023120066

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-28T00:34:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-05
  • City: PRINCETOWN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPRESS NATURAL GAS LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: CNG Module (Quantum) involved in off road accident. Twelve of the fifty one cylinders released product due to the impact of the accident. In order to recover equipment remaining thirty-nine cylinders, a controlled vent to atmosphere occurred on each intact cylinders
